attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: donald, if you see this i hope you know that you won’t be able to ban tiktok without gen z putting up a fight. you are a horrible person. a horrible, racist, transphobic, homophobic, ignorant, egotistical, self centered piece of crap. and on top of that you’re a rapist✨ by far the worst person to ever be in office, you’ve turned this country into a joke. i can’t wait til you get voted out of office ❤️

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.review: Downloaded the app to talk to some fellow trump supporters about how awesome the president is but instead found the app to be filled with chat rooms of literal clowns. They said this app is actually a circus type app that allows clowns from all over the US to keep in touch since all of covid happened. Very disappointed to find this out after waiting a week for this app to download ☹️

attributes.title: Horrible absolutely horrible😔🤮🤢
attributes.review:
I was tryna download this app because yk “trump 2020 yay 😁 “ but then right when I opened it I saw a rat on it and it flew out my phone and 🐀 on top of my head. It then pooed and peed on top of me and it wouldn’t die so I tried to put it back in the phone and I did but now it’s not letting me I delete and idk Wht to do🤔 
💨 farts 💨 * “did you guys hear that? I’m rlly scared guys idk what was that it wasn’t me guys “

attributes.title: H O R R I B L E
attributes.review: it took HOURS to download and when it did, it completely hacked my phone and made it glitch so bad. my phone was brand new and it coincidentally started shocking me at random points during the day. it nearly caught on fire the one time. i had to buy a whole new phone! absolutely ridiculous!!! worst app ever created!!! do N O T recommend. trump or apple better pay me 800 dollars for my phone.

attributes.title: Hate it
attributes.review: Who is trump and why does he use fake tan when he’s got tons of money (so I heard)✨ also why does he gotta bully disabled people on radio stations? That’s right I heard him on the radio making fun of people (some president we have 🙄) also he’s racist, fat, ugly, old, annoying, rude, sexist, he’s a rapist, and aPedophile. Y’all still wanna “make America great?” Not with him you can’t, that’s why I say “Gerard Way 2020!!!!”

attributes.title: Don’t get this!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my grandma died immediately after. The next morning my dog got hit by a car!!! Later that night all of our bank accounts got erased and now we’re homeless 😔 but that’s not even the worst part... after our first night in a dumpster, I woke up to find my left pointer toe had gone missing. This app is bad news!!!

attributes.title: gross 😖
attributes.review:
I don't like your little games
Don't like your tilted stage
The role you made me play
Of the fool, no, I don't like you

attributes.title: ✨I want to talk to the manager✨
attributes.review: First of all, this app took 8 hrs to download. And then, it charged $129 from my credit card. It also took all of my personal data which is just unacceptable. When i contacted the people to get my money back, the wouldn’t refund me!!!!! This is such a terrible terrible service. I’d rather make my own app than to waste time here. I WANT TO SPEAK TO THE MANAGER RIGT NOW BECAUSE I WANT YOU FIRED 🧚🏼‍♂️ ✨

attributes.title: Sadness
attributes.review: This app is THE WORST. It took forever to download. I was outraged! But I let it take as long as it needed to be able to support our wonderful racist orange man❤️ then I got the app and you’ll never believe it, it didn’t work! I couldn’t click on anything and nothing would load!! Absolutely disappointing. I might have to stop supporting the Oompa Loompa after this horrible incident😢😢😢😞😞😞😞

attributes.title: bad app 😾👎🏻
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see the news and things that he does and updates for it, but right when i got in it , my phone glitches SO MUCH and it all of a sudden got SO SLOW and i had to go to the store to get it fixed bc it turned off, but they said that a virus got in it, and i barely got my new phone , like this app rly made me get a new phone 😑
